AICTE IDEA LAB Placements Objective Placement Policy Placement Summary Placement Brochure Trainers Placement Gallery Contact T & P Pay Fees Youtube Channel Student Alumini Objectives NSRIT from the inception has established a separate Department of Training
& Placements and Career Development Cell, headed by a full time Training &
Placement Officer (TPO) assisted by 7 faculty members as ‘placement
Coordinators’ to maximize the opportunities for all our students in IT Sector as
well as in core sectors. All the students are given Campus Recruitment Training on Quantitative
Techniques, Logical Reasoning, Verbal Reasoning, English Grammar, Group
Discussions, Mock interviews, Tips and Tricks on facing the Interviews etc
from the first year onwards. A full time in-house CRT trainers are available to
train on the above mentioned subjects. We conduct continuous AI Proctored Assessments to make and analyse the
students in the aspects Aptitude, Reasoning, Verbal, Competitive Coding
Skills, Communication skills, soft skills etc, and take then the feedback with
the help of Artificial Intelligence. This assessment is based on feedbacks of
recruiters at the end of their recruitment process, collect performance of our
alumni working with them; and implement them in the next training sessions
for better performance. We have sufficient Infrastructure support like AC Auditorium (300 occupancy),
Examination Halls (700-occupancy at-one-go), AC interview cubicles etc for
on / pooled campus selections. We will also conduct various seminars / workshops on Alternative career
services (ACS) like Higher Education, Abroad Education, Government sector
jobs, Entrepreneurship development support like establishment of Start-Up’s
etc to promote the student based on his skills / interest. With the co-ordination of all these stake holders, we could increase our
placement percentage year on year and serve for the best placements to the
student community. We are proud to say that NSRIT ranked in the Top-Twenty Most Preferred
Colleges out of 700+ private engineering colleges in the state of AP (as per
APSCHE, the body which conducts engineering admissions in the state). ×
